00001 #include "cs_utils.h"
00002 
00003 /* Borrowed from one of Tim Davis' examples in the CSparse Demo directory */
00004 /* 1 if A is square & upper tri., -1 if square & lower tri., 0 otherwise */
00005 static int is_sym (cs *A)
00006 {
00007     int is_upper, is_lower, j, p, n = A->n, m = A->m, *Ap = A->p, *Ai = A->i ;
00008     if (m != n) return (0) ;
00009     is_upper = 1 ;
00010     is_lower = 1 ;
00011     for (j = 0 ; j < n ; j++)
00012     {
00013         for (p = Ap [j] ; p < Ap [j+1] ; p++)
00014         {
00015             if (Ai [p] > j) is_upper = 0 ;
00016             if (Ai [p] < j) is_lower = 0 ;
00017         }
00018     }
00019     return (is_upper ? 1 : (is_lower ? -1 : 0)) ;
00020 }
00021 
00030 cs *Matrix_as_cs(cs *ans, SEXP x)
00031 {
00032     char *valid[] = {"dgCMatrix", "dtCMatrix", ""};/* had also "dsCMatrix", but that
00033                                                     * only stores one triangle */
00034     int *dims, ctype = Matrix_check_class(class_P(x), valid);
00035     SEXP islot;
00036 
00037     if (ctype < 0) error("invalid class of object to Matrix_as_cs");
00038                                 /* dimensions and nzmax */
00039     dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym));
00040     ans->m = dims[0]; ans->n = dims[1];
00041     islot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_iSym);
00042     ans->nz = -1;               /* indicates compressed column storage */
00043     ans->nzmax = LENGTH(islot);
00044     ans->i = INTEGER(islot);
00045     ans->p = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_pSym));
00046     ans->x = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym));
00047 
00048     return ans;
00049 }
00050 
00061 SEXP Matrix_cs_to_SEXP(cs *a, char *cl, int dofree)
00062 {
00063     SEXP ans;
00064     char *valid[] = {"dgCMatrix", "dsCMatrix", "dtCMatrix", ""};
00065     int *dims, ctype = Matrix_check_class(cl, valid), nz;
00066 
00067     if (ctype < 0)
00068         error("invalid class of object to Matrix_cs_to_SEXP");
00069     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS(cl)));
00070                                 /* allocate and copy common slots */
00071     dims = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym, INTSXP, 2));
00072     dims[0] = a->m; dims[1] = a->n;
00073     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_pSym, INTSXP, a->n + 1)),
00074            a->p, a->n + 1);
00075     nz = a->p[a->n];
00076     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_iSym, INTSXP, nz)), a->i, nz);
00077     Memcpy(REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, nz)), a->x, nz);
00078     if (ctype > 0) {
00079         int uplo = is_sym(a);
00080         if (!uplo) error("cs matrix not compatible with class");
00081         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_diagSym, mkString("N"));
00082         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_uploSym, mkString(uplo < 0 ? "L" : "U"));
00083     }
00084     if (dofree > 0) cs_spfree(a);
00085     if (dofree < 0) Free(a);
00086     UNPROTECT(1);
00087     return ans;
00088 }

00100 css *Matrix_as_css(css *ans, SEXP x)
00101 {
00102     char *cl = class_P(x);
00103         *valid[] = {"css_LU", "css_QR", ""};
00104     int *nz = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("nz"))),
00105         ctype = Matrix_check_class(cl, valid);
00106 
00107     if (ctype < 0) error("invalid class of object to Matrix_as_css");
00108     ans->q = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("Q")));
00109     ans->m2 = nz[0]; ans->lnz = nz[1]; ans->unz = nz[2];
00110     switch(ctype) {
00111     case 0:                     /* css_LU */
00112         ans->pinv = (int *) NULL;
00113         ans->parent = (int *) NULL;
00114         ans->cp = (int *) NULL;
00115         break;
00116     case 1:                     /* css_QR */
00117         ans->pinv = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("Pinv")));
00118         ans->parent = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("parent")));
00119         ans->cp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("cp")));
00120         break;
00121     default:
00122         error("invalid class of object to Matrix_as_css");
00123     }
00124     return ans;
00125 }
00126 
00136 csn *Matrix_as_csn(csn *ans, SEXP x)
00137 {
00138     char *valid[] = {"csn_LU", "csn_QR", ""};
00139     int ctype = Matrix_check_class(class_P(x), valid);
00140 
00141     if (ctype < 0) error("invalid class of object to Matrix_as_csn");
00142     ans->U = Matrix_as_cs(GET_SLOT(x, install("U")));
00143     ans->L = Matrix_as_cs(GET_SLOT(x, install("L")));
00144     switch(ctype) {
00145     case 0:
00146         ans->B = (double*) NULL;
00147         ans->pinv = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("Pinv")));
00148         break;
00149     case 1:
00150         ans->B = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, install("beta")));
00151         ans->pinv = (int*) NULL;
00152         break;
00153     default:
00154         error("invalid class of object to Matrix_as_csn");
00155     }
00156     return ans;
00157 }

00171 SEXP Matrix_css_to_SEXP(css *S, char *cl, int dofree, int m, int n)
00172 {
00173     SEXP ans;
00174     char *valid[] = {"css_LU", "css_QR", ""};
00175     int *nz, ctype = Matrix_check_class(cl, valid);
00176 
00177     if (ctype < 0)
00178         error("Inappropriate class '%s' for Matrix_css_to_SEXP", cl);
00179     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS(cl)));
00180                                 /* allocate and copy common slots */
00181     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("Q"), INTSXP, n)), S->q, n);
00182     nz = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("nz"), INTSXP, 3));
00183     nz[0] = S->m2; nz[1] = S->lnz; nz[2] = S->unz;
00184     switch(ctype) {
00185     case 0:
00186         break;
00187     case 1:
00188         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("Pinv"), INTSXP, m)),
00189                S->pinv, m);
00190         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("parent"), INTSXP, n)),
00191                S->parent, n);
00192         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("cp"), INTSXP, n)),
00193                S->cp, n);
00194         break;
00195     default:
00196         error("Inappropriate class '%s' for Matrix_css_to_SEXP", cl);
00197     }
00198     if (dofree > 0) cs_sfree(S);
00199     if (dofree < 0) Free(S);
00200     UNPROTECT(1);
00201     return ans;
00202 }

00214 SEXP Matrix_csn_to_SEXP(csn *N, char *cl, int dofree)
00215 {
00216     SEXP ans;
00217     char *valid[] = {"csn_LU", "csn_QR", ""};
00218     int ctype = Matrix_check_class(cl, valid), n = (N->U)->n;
00219 
00220     if (ctype < 0)
00221         error("Inappropriate class '%s' for Matrix_csn_to_SEXP", cl);
00222     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS(cl)));
00223                                 /* allocate and copy common slots */
00224     /* FIXME: Use the triangular matrix classes for csn_LU */
00225     SET_SLOT(ans, install("L"), /* these are free'd later if requested */
00226              Matrix_cs_to_SEXP(N->L, "dgCMatrix", 0));
00227     SET_SLOT(ans, install("U"),
00228              Matrix_cs_to_SEXP(N->U, "dgCMatrix", 0));
00229     switch(ctype) {
00230     case 0:
00231         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("Pinv"), INTSXP, n)),
00232                N->pinv, n);
00233         break;
00234     case 1:
00235         Memcpy(REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("beta"), REALSXP, n)),
00236                N->B, n);
00237         break;
00238     default:
00239         error("Inappropriate class '%s' for Matrix_csn_to_SEXP", cl);
00240     }
00241     if (dofree > 0) cs_nfree(N);
00242     if (dofree < 0) {
00243         Free(N->L); Free(N->U); Free(N);
00244     }
00245     UNPROTECT(1);
00246     return ans;
00247 }
